hello.text: {i}A girl with a checkered pattern bursts angrily into your office. Looks like she forced her way in{s}

how.text: Doctor, I happen to be in quite an unpleasant situation, since yesterday I can't go to my fields without... consequences.

what.text: Well, last year I planted some new flowers. They've started blooming recently.

check.text: {i}You notice her eyes and nose are red. She seems to be embarrassed.{s}

water.text: {i}This actually doesn't seem to improve her situation at all. Green leaves begin to sprout out of her body, eventually strangling her...{s}

punch.text: {i}She takes it as a greeting, and greets you back. Sadly for you, her punch packs quite a bit more than yours{s}

medicine.text: {i}You hand her a medicine against allergies. It seems to work against the symptoms, but she still feels uneasy.{s}

science.text: {i}She sneezes and frowns at you. It doesn't look like she'd be willing to enter one of your healing cells{s}

analyse.text: {i}You manage to convince her to let you collect a few samples of her cells. After a spectrometry analysis, it looks like their is some kind of vegetal parasite in them.{s}
